paragraphs: =cuarto=, _m._, quarter; =las dos y --=, =34=, 21, quarter past two.
=cuatro=, _adj. num._, four; =en --palabras=, =96=, 13, briefly, in a word.

=cuenta=, _f._, count, account, reckoning; affair, business, =88=, 20, =103=, 11; =de --=, =91=, 7, of account, of importance; =darse --=, =19=, 11, to explain, to give account; to take account; to understand; =pedir --s=, =22=, 5, to ask for a reckoning; =¡vamos a --s!= =112=, 5, let us get to business.
=cuento=, _m._, story; =venir a --=, =6=, 30, to be in place.
=cuero=, _m._, skin; =en --s=, naked, stripped to the skin, =84=, 1.
=cuidado=, _m._, care, anxiety, =¡--!= =30=, 12, take care! =no hay --=, =50=, 24, no danger.
=chanza=, _f._, joke, jest; =no estoy para --s=, =103=, 7, I am in no mood for jesting, in no joking humor.
=chasco=, _m._, practical joke; fizzle; disappointment; =se han llevado un solemne --=, =88=, 13, you have got jolly well left; =1=, 12, =juegos de --=, tricks, farce.
=chico, ca=, _adj._, small, little; =chica=, =78=, 25, (_in direct address_) my child, little one.
=chiquilla=, _f._, little girl; =-- de cuatro años=, four-year old child, =14=, 6. [p. 181]
=daño=, _m._, damage, harm, injury; =hacerse ----=, =39=, 5, to hurt oneself; =hacer ----=, =72=, 28, to hurt.

=dar=, _v. a._, to give; to provide; to furnish, =10=, 22; to tell, =112=, 10; =---- otro paso=, =71=, 13, to take another step; =---- paso atrás=, to take a step backwards, =80=, 18; =---- con=, =93=, 6, to meet with; =---- con el codo=, =47=, 9, to nudge; =---- a=, =52=, 17, =52=, 21, =65=, 3; =---- sobre=, =77=, 18, to lead to, to open on, (_of a door or window_); =---- la hora=, to call the hour, =20=, 23; =---- las cinco=, =44=, 13, to strike five; _v. refl._, =----se=, =94=, 16, to yield, to surrender; =----se cuenta=, =19=, 11, =75=, 1, to be conscious, to take account, to appreciate.
=de=, _prep._, of, for, from, concerning, as, by, in, on, with, as to.

=deber=, _v. a._, to owe; _v. n._, to be obliged; =debe ir=, =12=, 7, he should go, he must go; =debemos advertir=, =35=, 3, we should notice, we must notice; =---- de=, _expression of probability_: must be, =64=, 9, _etc._; =debió de asustarse=, =67=, 24, he must have been frightened; =no ha debido de=, =84=, 26, cannot have, _etc._

=decir=, _v. a._, to say, to tell, to speak; to mention, to describe, =26=, 14; =es ----=, =122=, 15, that is, that is to say; =que digamos=, =119=, 3, so to speak, to speak of, as it were; =diz que=, =43=, 13, they say, the story runs; =he dejado dicho=, =79=, 26, I left word; =lo dicho=, =81=, 4, you heard what I said, you hear me; =dijérase=, =18=, 5, it might be said.
=declarar=, _v. a._, to declare; =79=, 6, =79=, 7, to admit; to explain; =----se=, _v. refl._, =----se contigo=, =32=, 27, to open his heart to you.

=dejar=, _v. a._, to allow, to permit; to leave; =---- de=, to cease, to stop; =déjeme de reyes=, =87=, 23, don't talk to me about kings, let me alone with your kings; =----=, =94=, 23, to let go of, to release; _v. refl._, =----se de=, to get rid of, to stop, to leave; =déjate de bachillerías=, =50=, 4, stop your chattering, stop your nonsense; =dejémonos de latines=, =43=, 16, let us put aside this latin stuff.
=delante de=, _prep._, before, in front of, opposite, in the presence of.
=demás=, _adj._, other, remaining, =lo ----=, the rest; =los ----=, the others, the rest.
=demostrar=, _v. a._, to prove, to demonstrate, to show.
=denominarse=, _v. refl._, to be called, to be denominated.
=depender=, _v. n._, to depend; =---- de=, to depend upon.
=derecha=, _f._, right, the right side, the right hand. [p. 183]
=derretirse=, _v. refl._, to melt, to become fluid, =110=, 25; _for_ =40=, 24, _see_ =gacha=.
=derribar=, _v. a._, to tear down; =95=, 6, to throw down, to overturn; =los derribados=, =95=, 22, the overthrown.
=desafío=, _m._, challenge, _sp._, challenge to a duel; duel.
=descansar=, _v. a._, to rest; =-- armas=, =57=, 29, to ground arms; =--=, _v. n._, to rest, to rest one's self.
=descolgar=, _v. a._, to take down; =--se=, _v. refl._, to swing down, to slide down.
=descollar=, _v. n._, to rise above, to predominate, =100=, 17.
=desconocer=, _v. a._, to not know, to fail to know, _1_, 2.
=descuartizar=, _v. a._, to cut in quarters; =44=, 19, to cut up.
=descubrir=, _v. a._, to discover, to disclose, to reveal; to uncover; to find; =--se=, _v. refl._, to be disclosed, to come into sight; to uncover (_the head_), remove hat, _see note to_ =28=, 2.
=descuidar=, _v. n._, to be easy, to be without fear; =descuida=, =30=, 14, don't be afraid.
=descuido=, _m._, carelessness, inattention, negligence; moment of inattentiveness, =41=, 6.
=desde=, _prep._, from, since; =-- que=, as soon as; =-- luego=, =104=, 1, immediately, from that moment; =-- arriba=, =75=, 20, from above; =-- en medio=, =55=, 2, from the middle. [p. 184]
=desembozar=, _v. a._, to unwrap, to unveil; _see note to_ =26=, 19.
=deshecho, cha=, _adj._ (=deshacer=), violent, uncontrolled, =5=, 9; =calavera --=, =111=, 11, utter rake, out and out rake.
=deshonrado, da=, _adj._, dishonored, =96=, 16, _perhaps better taken as pp. of_
=deslindar=, _v. a._, to clear up, to disentangle, to mark the bounds of, to delimit, =6=, 27.
=deslizarse=, _v. refl._, to slip, to slip down, =74=, 10.
=desnaturalizarse=, _v. refl._, to change nature, to change character, =4=, 13.
=despachar=, _v. a._, to dispatch, to attend to, =62=, 4, =63=, 1; =--se=, _v. refl._, to hasten, to make haste, to hurry; =se están despachando=, =86=, 11, are flying about, are hurrying about.
=despegar=, _v. a._, to part, to open, (_of the lips_), =62=, 20.
=despertar=, _v. a._, to awaken; =--se=, _v. refl._, to awake, to wake up, to wake, =87=, 9.
=destacarse=, _v. refl._, to stand out, to detach itself, =36=, 5, =60=, 8.
=destinar=, _v. a._, to destine, to devote; _pp. as adj._, =27=, 4, destined, appointed.
=detener=, _v. a._, to detain, to stop, to hold back; =--se=, _v. refl._, to stop, to stay, to stand still.
=devolver=, _v. a._, to return, to repay, to give back.
=día=, _m._, day; =-- de precepto=, =8=, 5, holy day of obligation; =de --=, =24=, 14, by day.
=diablo=, _m._, devil; =¡qué --s!= =49=, 20, deuce take, what the devil.
=diente=, _m._, tooth; (_sp._ front tooth; _cf._ =muelas=, =25=, 29); =entre --s=, =59=, 6, between his teeth.
=difunto, ta=, _adj._, dead, defunct; =el -- Obispo=, =17=, 5, the late bishop.
=dirección=, _f._, direction; destination; address; =con -- a=, =65=, 16, =85=, 29, =124=, 2, _etc._, towards, in the direction of.

=dirigir=, _v. a._, to direct, to supervise; to direct, to address, to send; to aim; =dirigió una mirada=, =41=, 1, =56=, 6, shot a glance; =--se=, _v. refl._, to take one's way, to go;, =24=, 5, _etc._; to address, to turn to, to speak to, =39=, 24, =103=, 22, =117=, 3, _etc._
=discurrir=, _v. n._, to talk together, to speak together, =30=, 1; to discourse, to hold forth; to move about, to move to and fro, =45=, 16.
=disimulado, da=, _adj._, disguised, concealed; =muy disimulada=, =55=, 9, well concealed, very well concealed.
=disimular=, _v. a._, to conceal, to hide; to dissemble.
=disparar=, _v. a._, to fire, to shoot; _pp._ =disparado=, =67=, 21, like a shot.
=distinguir=, _v. a._, to distinguish; to select; to recognize, make out, to distinguish, =71=, 14, =113=, 17, _etc._
=divertirse=, _v. refl._, to enjoy oneself, to amuse oneself, to have a good time; =-- conmigo=, =98=, 28, to trifle with me, to have fun with me, at my expense, to make sport of me. [p. 187]
=divisar=, _v. a._, to descry, to perceive; to recognize;, =60=, 4, =104=, 28.
=do ut des=, _latin, tit._ III, I give, that thou give; give and take.
=doce=, _adj. num._, twelve; =las --=, twelve o'clock; =las -- y media=, half past twelve.
=dominar=, _v. a._, to rule, to control, to restrain, to dominate; =--se=, _v. refl_., =109=, 21, _etc._, to control oneself, keep one's temper.
=don=, _m._, gift; =-- de gentes=, =10=, 19, gift of making friends, of making oneself liked, gift of getting on with people.
=Don=, _m._, Mr., Don, Sir; _used only with the given name_.
=Don Carlos IV=, _npr. m._, Charles the Fourth.
=Doña=, _f._, Doña; Miss, Madam; _used only with the given name_.
=dormir=, _v. n._, to sleep; to sleep off, _cf._ =mona=; =--se=, _v. refl._, to go to sleep.

=echar=, _v. a._, to throw, to cast; to drive out, to throw out; to throw away; to offer; to pour; to bestow; =-- espumarajos=, =107=, 16, to foam (_with rage_); =-- llamas=, =57=, 12, to flash fire; =-- yescas=, =114=, 16, to light tinder; =-- mano=, =91=, 3, to seize; =--se a=, =60=, 15, =110=, 24, to begin, to set oneself at; =--se a reír=, =32=, 9, to burst out laughing; =--se a la cara=, =80=, 20, (_of a gun_) to bring to the cheek, take aim; =--de menos=, =91=, 23, to miss; "_el verbo echar es la mayor parte de las veces una especie de comodín que hace a todo,_" "_the verb echar is for the most part a sort of trump that does for everything._"--_Spanish saying, quoted by Tolhausen_.
=educar=, _v. a._, to educate, to bring up, to train.
=efecto=, _m._, effect, result; =en --=, =43=, 13, _etc._, in effect, in fact.
=ejercitar=, _v. a._, to exercise, to practice, to try, =87=, 12.
=él, ella, ello=, _pr. pers._, he, she, it.
=embozar=, _v. a._, to wrap up; (_used specially of the throat and face_); _cf. note to_ =26=, 19.
=empezar=, _v. a. and v. n._, to begin.
=emplear=, _v. a._, to employ, to use, to make use of.
=en=, _prep._, in; at; on; with; to; by; against; among; about; _with part. pres._, when, on.
=enamorar=, _v. a._, to win love, to win affection; to charm, to please, to captivate, _sp._ =15=, 19; =--se=, _v. refl._, to fall in love; to be charmed.
=encadenar=, _v. a._, to chain up, to put in chains, =69=, 15.
=encaminarse=, _v. refl._, to take one's way, to start, to go.
=encargar=, _v. a._, to charge, to instruct, =51=, 17; =--se=, _v. refl._, to agree, to undertake, =11=, 1, _etc._
=encender=, _v. a._, to light, to set fire to; _pp._ =encendido=, lighted, burning.
=encerrar=, _v. a._, to contain, to enclose; =--se=, _v. refl._, =98=, 27, to shut oneself in, to lock oneself in.
=encima de, por -- de=, _prep._, above; upon; over.
=encontrar=, _v. a._, to meet, to meet with, to find; =--se=, _v. refl._, to be, to happen to be, to find oneself; =--se con=, to meet with, to find, =40=, 22, =108=, 2, _etc._
=enfadarse=, _v. refl._, to become angry, to lose one's temper.
=enfrente=, _adv._, opposite, before; =enfrente de=, _prep._, before, in front of, =41=, 11.
=enfurecerse=, _v. refl._, to grow furious, to burst out.

=entender=, _v. a._, to understand; =-- de razones=, =79=, 22, to listen to reason; =--se=, _v. refl._, to come to an understanding; to agree; to be agreed, to have an understanding; to understand each other, one another; to know what one is about.
=enterar=, _v. a._, to inform, =115=, 12, _etc._; =--se=, _v. refl._, to inform oneself, to inquire into.
=entonces=, _adv._, then; =desde --=, since then, from that time; =de --=, of those times, of those days, =42=, 4, _tit._ XXIV; =en aquel --=, =17=, 24, at that time, in those days.

=entrar=, _v. n._, to enter, to come in, to go in; to enter upon, to begin, =103=, 8, _etc._; to come into market, 8, 16; =-- en fuego=, to open fire, =108=, 20; =hasta muy entrado el mes de Diciembre=, =70=, 4, until far into the month of December.
=entregar=, _v. a._, to hand over, to pass on; =--se=, _v. refl._, to give oneself up, to surrender.
=entusiasmar=, _v. a._, to transport, to enrapture, to fill with enthusiasm.
=equivaler=, _v. n._, to equal; to be the same as, to be as much as, =3=, 11, =24=, 3.
=escalera=, _f._, staircase, stairs; =por la -- abajo=, =85=, 21, down the stairs.
=escandalizar=, _v. a._, to scandalize; to offend; =--se=, _v. refl._, to be offended, to be scandalized, to take offence;, =2=, 5, =51=, 2, =81=, 28.
=escapar=, _v. n._, =--se=, _v. refl._, to escape, to get away, to run away.
=escape=, _f._, flight, hasty flight; =a --=, =67=, 28, at top speed.
=escarbar=, _v. a._, to scratch, to dig, to rake.
=escarnecer=, _v. a._, to mock, to ridicule, to bring into contempt, =25=, 12.
=escuchar=, _v. a._, to listen, to listen to.
=escurrir=, _v. a._, =64=, 23, to drain; =-- el bulto=, =52=, 27, to slip away, to get out of the way; _cf._ =bulto=.

=eso=, _pr. neuter_, that; =¡-- es!= that's it! just so!; =por --=, for that, therefore, on that account, for that reason; =-- de las once=, about eleven o'clock; =-- que no=, =14=, 14, that, although.
=espalda=, _f._, shoulder; back, =87=, 2, =116=, 6; _pl._ =--s=, back; =cargado de --s=, stoop-shouldered, hunchbacked, =18=, 2, _etc._; =de --s=, =38=, 18, =95=, 6, backward, on his, her, back.
=espaldar=, _m._, back (_of a chair or bench, etc._).
=español, ola=, _adj._, Spanish; =a la antigua --a=, =6=, 19, in the good old Spanish fashion.
=esperar=, _v. a._, to hope; to expect; to await; to wait.
=espeso, sa=, _adj._, thick; =lo más --=, =30=, 5, the thickest part.
=esposo=, _m._, husband; _pl._ =--s=, =54=, 9, husband and wife, married pair.
=esquilón=, _m._, bell; (_the smaller bell of the church_) =24=, 2.
=estado=, _m._, state; nation; condition, estate; =cuarto --=, =117=, 8, fourth estate; =en -- honesto=, =4=, 1, of honest, honorable condition, decent, marriageable.
=estallar=, _v. n._, to burst out, to break out, =127=, 9.

=estar=, _v. n._, to be; =¿cómo está la señora?= =34=, 12, how is her ladyship? =-- para=, to be in the mood for, to be inclined; =lo estoy=, =80=, 19, I am; =--se=, _v. refl._, to stay, =51=, 10, _etc._; to remain, to stand still.
=esto=, _pron. neut._, this; =en --=, =38=, 23, =86=, 7, =121=, 1, _etc._, at this moment, at this juncture; =con --=, =61=, 15, herewith; hereupon.
=Estella=, _f._, Estella, town of Spain, province of Navarre, about 25 miles southwest of Pampeluna.
=estrenar=, _v. a._, to use for the first time, to initiate, to handle.
=eterno, na=, _adj._, eternal; spiritual, _as opposed to temporal_, =6=,
